The New York City Council voted 29-22 to extend term limits for New York City Mayors. The vote comes after the same council denied a referendum vote, 28-22, on extending term limits. Source: Truly Newsworthy, Truly Newsworthy - Breaking U.S., International, Political and Economic News
 
 I think this is great. Bloomberg is awesome. I wanted him to run for president.

post_info.post_title: Bloomberg gets the option to run again!
